sqlMap.select:
SELECT AGENT_ID ,AGENT_NAME ,REG_NO ,TAX_NO ,REG_ADDR ,REGION ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME ,SETT_ACCOUNT_NO ,SETT_AGENCY ,SETT_ACC_TYPE ,MER_SYS_ID ,LEVEL ,SUPER_AGENT_ID ,BILL_CYCLE ,TERMINAL_TYPE ,BUS_TYPE ,STATUS ,CREATE_TIME ,REMARK ,RESERVED ,LOGO ,COLOR ,AGENT_RATE_1 ,AGENT_HIGHEST_FEE ,AGENT_PROFIT_RATE ,AGENT_RATE_2 FROM AGENCT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND AGENCT_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(AGENT_ID) =#agent_id#
(AGENT_NAME) Like '%'||(#agent_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_NO) Like '%'||(#reg_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TAX_NO) Like '%'||(#tax_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_ADDR) Like '%'||(#reg_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REGION) Like '%'||(#region:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACC_TYPE) Like '%'||(#sett_acc_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(LEVEL) Like '%'||(#level:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUPER_AGENT_ID) =#super_agent_id#
(BILL_CYCLE) Like '%'||(#bill_cycle:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#terminal_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bus_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGO) Like '%'||(#logo:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COLOR) Like '%'||(#color:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM AGENCT_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND AGENCT_INFO.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(AGENT_ID) =#agent_id#
(AGENT_NAME) Like '%'||(#agent_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_NO) Like '%'||(#reg_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TAX_NO) Like '%'||(#tax_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REG_ADDR) Like '%'||(#reg_addr:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REGION) Like '%'||(#region:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#sett_account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACCOUNT_NO) Like '%'||(#sett_account_no:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_AGENCY) Like '%'||(#sett_agency:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SETT_ACC_TYPE) Like '%'||(#sett_acc_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(LEVEL) Like '%'||(#level:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUPER_AGENT_ID) =#super_agent_id#
(BILL_CYCLE) Like '%'||(#bill_cycle:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TERMINAL_TYPE) Like '%'||(#terminal_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(BUS_TYPE) Like '%'||(#bus_type:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_TIME) Like '%'||(#create_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED) Like '%'||(#reserved:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LOGO) Like '%'||(#logo:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COLOR) Like '%'||(#color:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_RATE_1) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_HIGHEST_FEE) Like '%'||(#agent_highest_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_PROFIT_RATE) Like '%'||(#agent_profit_rate:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(AGENT_RATE_2) Like '%'||(#agent_rate_2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
